languages.text: "Этот Четвертый — больной какой-то. Команд знать не хочет, делает что вздумается. Вот и заперли его — от беды подальше, Ваш-Звездная Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Этот Четвертый — больной какой-то. Команд знать не хочет, делает что вздумается. Вот и заперли его — от беды подальше".

languages.text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."
languages.original_text: "Этот Четвертый — больной какой-то. Команд знать не хочет, делает что вздумается. Вот и заперли его — от беды подальше, Ваш-Звездная Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."
"There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."

languages.text: “四号有点不太对劲，它根本不听从命令，自己想干什么就干什么。所以他们把它锁起来了，免得它惹麻烦，来自上界的大人。”
languages.original_text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: “四号有点不太对劲，它根本不听从命令，自己想干什么就干什么。所以他们把它锁起来了，免得它惹麻烦，来自上界的大人。”
“四号有点不太对劲，它根本不听从命令，自己想干什么就干什么。所以他们把它锁起来了，免得它惹麻烦，来自上界的大人。”

languages.text: 「4号には何かおかしなところがあります。命令を理解せず、勝手気ままに動くだけです。だから問題を起こさないように閉じ込めたのです、天の閣下」
languages.original_text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: 「4号には何かおかしなところがあります。命令を理解せず、勝手気ままに動くだけです。だから問題を起こさないように閉じ込めたのです、天の閣下」

languages.text: «Algo le pasa al número 4. No reconoce las órdenes; hace lo que quiere. Por eso está encerrado: para evitar que se meta en problemas, Excelencia Celestial».
languages.original_text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: «Algo le pasa al número 4. No reconoce las órdenes; hace lo que quiere. Por eso está encerrado: para evitar que se meta en problemas, Excelencia Celestial».

languages.text: "Etwas stimmt nicht mit Nummer 4. Es erkennt keine Befehle und macht, was es will. Also haben sie es eingesperrt, damit es keinen Ärger macht, Eure himmlische Hoheit."
languages.original_text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: "Etwas stimmt nicht mit Nummer 4. Es erkennt keine Befehle und macht, was es will. Also haben sie es eingesperrt, damit es keinen Ärger macht, Eure himmlische Hoheit."

languages.text: "Dördüncüde bir sıkıntı var. Komutları bilmiyor, kafasına eseni yapıyor. Dolayısıyla beladan uzak durması için kilitlediler Semavi Efendimiz."
languages.original_text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: "4 Numara'da bir sıkıntı var. Komutları bilmiyor, kafasına eseni yapıyor. Dolayısıyla beladan uzak durması için kilitlediler, Semavi Efendimiz."

languages.text: « Le Numéro 4 ne tourne pas rond. Il ignore les ordres et n'en fait qu'à sa tête. Il a donc été enfermé pour sa propre sécurité, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »
languages.original_text: "There's something not right about Number 4. It doesn't know commands, just does whatever it wants. So they locked it up to keep it out of trouble, Your Celestial Highness."

traits.locale_text: « Le Numéro 4 ne tourne pas rond. Il ignore les ordres et n'en fait qu'à sa tête. Il a donc été enfermé pour sa propre sécurité, Votre Altesse Célestissime. »
